whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.content: We are the operator of the room reservation platform. The controller of your data is the RoomCtrl team. For any data protection inquiries, contact us at: {'roomctrlinfo@gmail.com'} .

dataRetention.title: How long do we store your data?
dataRetention.content: We store your data for as long as you use the application and up to 12 months after its deactivation, unless the law requires longer storage.

dataSharing.note: We do not transfer data to countries outside the EU.
